image.altText: An ambulance parked in front of the multi-story glass facade of a hospital.

props.synopsis: Doctors and nurses see people in crisis being turned away, patients discharged before it's safe, and interminable wait times boil over into life-threatening violence.

image.altText: A Palestinian woman in a headscarf holding a baby standing outside an apartment.

image.altText: Pete Hegseth scratches the right of his forehead near his hairline with his left thumb as he sits at a table near a man.

props.synopsis: The United States wants Australia to lift spending on defence to about $100 billion a year, with its Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth warning of a "real and potentially imminent" threat from China.Â

title.children: US demands Australia lifts defence spending by $40b a year 'as soon as possible'

image.altText: Zelenskyy sits at a table with an army man in camo

props.synopsis: Ukraine's security services says they have destroyed 34 per cent of Russia's air missile carriers with a bold drone attack. Here's what we know.

image.altText: FBI agents in bulletproof tan vests dressing colleagues in full-length olive green protective gear in a street

image.altText: A corrugated tin shed covered in snow.

image.altText: A medical worker in full PPE fills a syringe with COVID-19 vaccine.

image.altText: A man's eye illuminated by a light.

image.altText: a close-up of a woman's pregnant belly. she has one hand underneath her belly and one on top of it

props.synopsis: Women employed through the Pacific Australia Labour Mobility scheme are hiding pregnancies and attempting home abortions, a new report has revealed, prompting calls for greater support to address the health needs of migrant workers.

image.altText: A child holding paper cups over a wind contraption.
